text: The Spencer Museum of Art is an art museum located on the University of Kansas campus in Lawrence, Kansas. The museum has nearly 36,000 artworks and artifacts in many different forms. The collection shows the history of European and American art from ancient to contemporary, as well as East Asian art. title: Spencer Museum of Art
